meanings.definition: Opposed or forbidden by a command or order.
meanings.sent1: The counterbidden action was met with disapproval from the authorities.
meanings.sent2: The counterbidden behavior was not tolerated in the strict school environment.
meanings.sent3: The idea of wearing shorts to a formal event was counterbidden by the dress code.
meanings.sent4: His counterbidden request to leave work early was denied by the supervisor.
meanings.sent5: The counterbidden entrance to the restricted area was guarded by security.

meanings.definition: To forbid or prohibit in return.
meanings.sent1: The teacher counterbidden the use of cell phones during class.
meanings.sent2: She counterbidden him from attending the party as a consequence of his actions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student counterbidden his friend from borrowing his favorite pen.
meanings.sent4: The company counterbidden any form of discrimination in the workplace.
meanings.sent5: The new law counterbidden the sale of certain products in the market.
